content: What does the function draw do?

The `draw` function is called when the user and computer choose the same option in the Rock Paper Scissors game [Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:37, Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:49, Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:36].

Here's what it does:
1.  Logs "Draw game" to the console [Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:55].
2.  Sets the text of the `msg` element to "Game was a Draw!" [Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:56].
3.  Sets the text of the `compchoicedisplay` element to display what both the user and computer chose [Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:57].
4.  Changes the background color of the `msg` element to yellow and the text color to black [Rock Paper Scissors\script.js:58-59].
